summary: An epic from the dark ages about the legendary lost tribe of warrior women. The girls fly into danger, come up against fierce tribes, fall prey to sorcery, put to rest a family rivalry of centuries past and battle to victory.
cast: Mindi Miller|Penelope Reed|Joseph Whipp|Danitza Kingsley|Wolfram Hecht|Jacques Arndt|Charles Finch|Francisco Cocuzza|Santiago Mallo|Anita Larronde|Armando Capo|Maria Fournery|Noëlle Balfour|Esther Velázquez|Marcos Woinsky|Fabiana Smith|Lena Marie Johansson|Linda Guzmán|Alberto Marty|William Reta|Arturo Noal|Hugo Quiril
keywords: topless female nudity|female nudity|amazon tribe|amazon warrior|sword and sorcery
title: El enigma del talismán
